Html:
Is it only for me or do you also have the same problem, the user avatar is not fetched properly from db. and it's not displayed as a result.

i try to edit the AvatarImageFetch.ashx, however, no luck yet.

Ok, i resolved it, after several hours of trying !!
The reason was the case sensitivity issue. I really do not understand, since my db is already CI_AS, howcome it cannot find the object, when it's coded all in lowercase.

P.S: For V3, i strongly recommend the Code and DB Casing issue and clean and understandable Code, too.

Hi,

Can you show how you fixed this? I'm having the same issue.

Thanks

The problem was caused by somewhere ther was memberinfo when it should have been MemberInfo.

This is exactly why SubSonic will work WONDERS!
